Class ItemCollectionProperties
 
Packagecom.brightcove.brightaction.model
Classpublic class ItemCollection

A Video Object, representing a Brightcove Video in the Media APIs. Some values are mutable- such that they can be updated and then sent via the write APIs for changing the value of the Video in the Brightcove Service. Other, read only values, are not mutable and so can't be changed.
